abstract: Comprehensive guide for building, organizing, and maintaining a SwiftUI design system. Contains 45 rules across 8 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (token architecture, color system engineering) to incremental (governance, migration). Each rule includes detailed explanations, production-realistic SwiftUI examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and specific impact metrics. Covers token hierarchy design, asset catalog organization, component style libraries (ButtonStyle, LabelStyle), spacing/sizing tokens, theming infrastructure, and automated governance.
